description:
Founded in 1983, the Syracuse, New York, law office of Bottar Leone, PLLC, has been dedicated to those who have suffered personal injury or loss at the hands of another person or entity. With satellite offices in Utica, Albany, Watertown, Binghamton and Rochester, our law firm has proudly represented clients throughout upstate New York who have personal injury, wrongful death and tort claims.

With more than 100 years of combined legal experience, our attorneys have the knowledge and resources to assist anyone victimized by negligence or delinquency, including medical malpractice, birth injuries, brain and nerve injuries, motor vehicle accidents, product and premises liability, workplace injuries, toxic torts, and government negligence.

Led by nationally recognized attorneys Anthony and Michael Bottar and Edward Leone, our law firm has helped protect the rights of myriad clients while securing fair and just compensation. Operating under the belief that everyone deserves quality legal counsel, we do not shy away from cases simply because they may be too costly or complex. Our dedication to our clients and community and our aggressive approach to defending the rights of victims has earned us numerous awards and honors as well as the respect of our peers.

If you have been hurt or lost a loved one through an accident that was someone else's fault, or if you have been adversely affected by a defective product or botched medical procedure — no matter the cause of your undeserved injury or loss — the attorneys at Bottar Leone, PLLC, will stand in your corner and help you fight for your entitlements so that you can focus on your recovery. To find out how our law firm can be your legal ally in your time of need, contact our office for a free initial consultation.
